entry.tran: 神创说，特创论(相信《圣经》中上帝创世的记述，反对进化论)
entry.def: Creationism is the belief that the account of the creation of the universe in the Bible is true, and that the theory of evolution is incorrect.

means.word_mean: 1. the literal belief in the account of creation given in the Book of Genesis;

sentences.sentence: "creationism denies the theory of evolution of species"
